title: 65. Reparenting Part 3 Feeling Secure Within Your Own Energy
description:
Hey girl!
 
In this episode,  we talk about feeling secure within our own energy, knowing the difference between our energy and someone else's, and how codependency affects our energy.
 
Click here to join the no more codependent thought patterns masterclass!
 
(or visit beatricekamau.com/programs)
 
Business Inquiries?
Email the team: hi@beatricekamau.com
IG: @theselflovefix.
Website: www.beatricekamau.com
